viewAllOrders(Database) - Static method in class database.QMOrder
View all orders.
viewAllOrdersFromCustomer(int, Database) - Static method in class database.QMOrder
View all orders from customer.
viewAllSubscriptionsInOrders(Database) - Static method in class database.QMOrder
View all subscription orders.
viewMealsInOrder(int, Database) - Static method in class database.QMOrder
Returns all meals in an order in a two-dimensional String array
First index is row, second is column

Columns by second index:
0 : meal_id - int
1 : meal_name - String
2 : instructions - String
3 : available - boolean
4 : price - int
5 : order_id - int
6 : delivery_date - String
7 : quantity - int
8 : ready_delivery
9 : delivered
viewOrder(int, Database) - Static method in class database.QMOrder
View a food order.
viewOrderPrice(int, Database) - Static method in class database.QMOrder
View total price of an order.
viewOrdersByDeliveryDate(Date, Database) - Static method in class database.QMOrder
Returns meals to be delivered at DeliveryDate in a two-dimensional String array
First index is row, second is column

Columns by second index:
0 : order_id - int
1 : order_date - String
2 : customer_id - int
3 : info - String
4 : user_id - String
viewSubscriptionInOrder(int, Database) - Static method in class database.QMOrder
View subscription order.
